body: The ranger's hands and feet grow webs, and his body grows an oily fur that is water resistant. While in this form, the ranger gains a swim speed of 60 feet and a +5 bonus on Swim checks. Alternatively, the ranger can polymorph into the form of an otter or similar river mammal as if the caster of beast shape IV.
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Ranger/Ranger Archetypes/Shapeshifter/Master Shifter/Form of the Otter
name: Form of the Otter
